welcome_message_body: Welcome to Carson, where the sunny weather and friendly locals make for a charming experience. Known for its diverse community and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrance Airport serves as the hub for all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Torrance Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a cafe, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Whiteman Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The north terminal at Whiteman Airport is dedicated to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious experience for passengers.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Whiteman Airport is used for cargo and freight operations, allowing for efficient transportation of goods and supplies.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's WiFi network for free, but may experience slower speeds during peak hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and includes amenities such as a restaurant, gift shop, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights and offers a luxurious lounge and concierge services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bob Hope Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Van Nuys Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights at Van Nuys Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
